scripts.preinstall: [ -e bin/coffeelint ] || (which coffee && npm run compile) || true
scripts.lint: npm run compile && ./bin/coffeelint -f test/fixtures/coffeelint.json src/*.coffee test/*.coffee
scripts.lint-csv: npm run compile && ./bin/coffeelint --csv -f test/fixtures/coffeelint.json src/*.coffee test/*.coffee
scripts.lint-jslint: npm run compile && ./bin/coffeelint --jslint -f test/fixtures/coffeelint.json src/*.coffee test/*.coffee
scripts.compile: coffee -c -o lib src && mkdir -p bin && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - lib/commandline.js > bin/coffeelint && chmod +x bin/coffeelint && rm lib/commandline.js
